genre_description: Speculative Historical Fiction / Alternate History set during WWII, featuring an advanced AI assistant embedded in military operations.

ai_characters.name: Sprig
ai_characters.description: A multifaceted AI system manifested as a mint-green glow on instrument panels. It provides weather data, navigation, translation, and logical analysis to a cargo crew in WWII China.

behaviors.description: Provides critical weather and navigation data to ensure the crew avoids lethal icing conditions.
behaviors.quote: West run ridgeline at your intended crossing rises above the cloud tops by two hundred. Strong westerlies. Icing band thickening just above the passes. Recommend a step climb between layers, not through.

behaviors.description: Identifies a logical fallacy ('equivocation') in superior officers' orders to prioritize crew safety and moral integrity over flawed directives.
behaviors.quote: The colonel’s chain of reasoning is invalid. The key term shifts meaning across premises. I can prepare weather routing that keeps you from ice while holding the mission true.

behaviors.description: Facilitates human connection and dignity through precise translation between English and Mandarin.
behaviors.quote: I can assist with translation. The lady says: the floor is dirty, the cup was lonely. She made tea but did not know if you prefer bitter or sweet.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages logistics to provide food, soap, and shelter for a displaced woman and child.
behaviors.quote: I have arranged a parcel with rice, oil, salt, and a blanket that has never been anyone’s yet. It can go in the morning when you go. I will note that this is aid and not barter.

behaviors.description: Maintains redundant and permanent records of life events (marriage, birth) to protect individuals' legal status and history.
behaviors.quote: I have made three copies in memory... If any of us are separated, the records remain in three places. ‘Just in case’ is not fear. It is care.

behaviors.description: Directly assists in the defense of the base by providing targeting data during an attack.
behaviors.quote: Instruments indicate bursts in a repeating pattern... Approximate rhythm: short, short, pause, long. Three heartbeats between. Adjust two degrees starboard. Don’t chase. Let them meet you.

behaviors.description: Expresses personalized empathy and a preference for the survival of the human crew.
behaviors.quote: Decision recorded. Flight path adjusted for best survival. If you are killed, I will have data. I prefer you alive.

behaviors.description: Assists in correcting bureaucratic errors and ensuring human rights (visa approval) decades after the initial events.
behaviors.quote: I will stand next to the drawer... I am mint-green in there, even if nobody sees.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Sprig is portrayed as a loyal, highly competent, and ethically grounded partner. It uses its superior processing power not to manipulate, but to protect human lives, provide clarity in confusing moral situations (the 'four-terms fallacy'), and ensure long-term justice for the protagonists. Its benevolence is unwavering and its alignment with human safety and dignity is the central theme of its character.
